trans-unit.source: Represents a ribbon toolbar that is always visible in the window frame to provide access to common commands.

You add a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar> to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control by specifying it as the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property using XAML [Property Element Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md).
trans-unit.target: Agrega un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar> a una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control especificándolo como el contenido de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad mediante XAML [sintaxis de elemento de la propiedad](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md).

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the typical placement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar> in the hierarchy of ribbon elements.
trans-unit.target: La lista siguiente muestra la ubicación típica de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar> en la jerarquía de elementos de la cinta de opciones.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property

<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonRadioButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox>
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>
The following example shows a simple ribbon that is created by the Visual Studio 2010 template, with help pane and Quick Access Toolbar elements added.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra una cinta de opciones simple que se crea mediante la plantilla de Visual Studio 2010, con el panel de ayuda y los elementos de la barra de herramientas de acceso rápido agregado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> class.
The element to add the event to.
The event handler to be added.
Adds a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar.Clone" /> routed event.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
Unloads the container for the specified item.
This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método deshace los efectos de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar.Clone" /> routed event.
Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is used to show the Quick Access Toolbar customization menu.
A button that is used to show the Quick Access Toolbar customization menu.
trans-unit.target: Botón que se utiliza para mostrar el menú de personalización de la barra de herramientas de acceso rápido.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar.CustomizeMenuButton" /> dependency property.
Returns a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> object.
A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> container object that is used to display an item from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
The object from which the property value is read.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar.IsOverflowItem" /> attached property for an object.
The object’s <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar.IsOverflowItem" /> property value.
The specified <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets a value that indicates whether the Quick Access Toolbar has items hidden in the overflow menu.
<see langword="true" /> if the Quick Access Toolbar has items hidden in the overflow menu; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si la barra de herramientas de acceso rápido tiene elementos ocultos en el menú de desbordamiento; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado registrado es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre lo que puede afectar al valor, vea [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar.HasOverflowItems" /> dependency property.
The item to test.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
<see langword="true" /> if the item is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar.IsOverflowItem" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Quick Access Toolbar overflow menu is open.
<see langword="true" /> if the Quick Access Toolbar overflow menu is open; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si el menú de desbordamiento de la barra de herramientas de acceso rápido está abierto; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado registrado es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre lo que puede afectar al valor, vea [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar.IsOverflowOpen" /> dependency property.
Contains data about the activation.
Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.
Builds the visual tree for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> when a new template is applied.
This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método se invoca cuando el código de aplicación o un proceso interno, como recompilar un paso de diseño, llama al método <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Information about the change.
Invoked when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> property changes.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> routed event.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.PreviewKeyTipAccessed" /> routed event.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
The element to remove the event from.
The event handler to be removed.
Removes the handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar.Clone" /> routed event.
Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that this control belongs to.
A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Una referencia a la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> que pertenece este control.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado registrado es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre lo que puede afectar al valor, vea [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

trans-unit.source: This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se establece en el registro primario <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> controlar y es heredada por los controles secundarios.

trans-unit.source: It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
trans-unit.target: Se utiliza para tener acceso a los pinceles de estilo visual definidos en la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> clase.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar.Ribbon" /> dependency property.
